titleStmt.title: The promine, contening the maner, place and time, of the maist illuster King James the sext his first passing to the feildis: Directis to his hienes: Be P. H. familiar seruitour to his Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Hume, Patrick, Sir, fl. 1580-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Be Iohne Ros, for Henrie Charteris,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
